mapper.sql: f.ID, f.NAME, f.PERIODS, f.PERIODS_DESC, f.STATUS, f.PLAN_ACCOUNT, f.REAL_ACCOUNT, f.LOWEST_ACCOUNT, f.MOST_ACCOUNT, f.LOCK_LIMIT, f.LOCK_STYLE, f.LOCK_ENDTIME, f.PERCEIVED_RATE, f.ADD_RATE, f.SERVICE_RATE, f.EXIT_RATE, f.SUCCESS_TIME, f.VALID_TIME, f.CONTENT, f.SENDMESSAGE, f.ADDTIME, f.ADDIP, f.CANCEL_USER, f.CANCEL_TIME, f.CANCEL_REMARK, f.UUID, f.CONTRACT_NO, f.BID_PASSWORD, f.REMARK, f.PUBLISH_TIME, f.USER_ID, f.TENDER_TIMES, f.ACCOUNT_YES, f.PASSWORD_SOURCE, f.VERSION, f.END_TIME
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO t_first_borrow (NAME, PERIODS, PERIODS_DESC, STATUS, PLAN_ACCOUNT, REAL_ACCOUNT, LOWEST_ACCOUNT, MOST_ACCOUNT, LOCK_LIMIT, LOCK_STYLE, LOCK_ENDTIME, PERCEIVED_RATE, ADD_RATE, SERVICE_RATE, EXIT_RATE, SUCCESS_TIME, VALID_TIME, CONTENT, SENDMESSAGE, ADDTIME, ADDIP, CANCEL_USER, CANCEL_TIME, CANCEL_REMARK, UUID, CONTRACT_NO, BID_PASSWORD, REMARK, PUBLISH_TIME, USER_ID, TENDER_TIMES, ACCOUNT_YES,PASSWORD_SOURCE,VERSION, END_TIME) VALUES ( #{name}, #{periods}, #{periodsDesc}, #{status},#{planAccount},#{realAccount}, #{lowestAccount}, #{mostAccount}, #{lockLimit}, #{lockStyle}, #{lockEndtime}, #{perceivedRate}, #{addRate}, #{serviceRate}, #{exitRate}, #{successTime}, #{validTime}, #{content}, #{sendMessage}, #{addtime}, #{addIp}, #{cancelUser}, #{cancelTime}, #{cancelRemark}, #{uuid}, #{contractNo}, #{bidPassword}, #{remark},#{publishTime}, #{userId}, #{tenderTimes}, #{accountYes},#{passwordSource},#{version}, #{endTime})
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.select:
select
from t_first_borrow f where 1=1 and f.id=#{id}
mapper.update:
update t_first_borrow
NAME = #{name},
PERIODS = #{periods},
PERIODS_DESC = #{periodsDesc},
STATUS = #{status},
PLAN_ACCOUNT = #{planAccount},
REAL_ACCOUNT = #{realAccount},
LOWEST_ACCOUNT = #{lowestAccount},
MOST_ACCOUNT = #{mostAccount},
LOCK_LIMIT = #{lockLimit},
LOCK_STYLE = #{lockStyle},
LOCK_ENDTIME = #{lockEndtime},
PERCEIVED_RATE = #{perceivedRate},
ADD_RATE = #{addRate},
SERVICE_RATE = #{serviceRate},
EXIT_RATE = #{exitRate},
SUCCESS_TIME = #{successTime},
VALID_TIME = #{validTime},
CONTENT = #{content},
SENDMESSAGE = #{sendMessage},
CANCEL_USER = #{cancelUser},
CANCEL_TIME = #{cancelTime},
CANCEL_REMARK = #{cancelRemark},
UUID = #{uuid},
CONTRACT_NO = #{contractNo},
BID_PASSWORD = #{bidPassword},
REMARK = #{remark},
PUBLISH_TIME = #{publishTime},
TENDER_TIMES = #{tenderTimes},
ACCOUNT_YES = #{accountYes},
PASSWORD_SOURCE = #{passwordSource},
PASSWORD_SOURCE = null,BID_PASSWORD = null,
VERSION = #{version},
END_TIME = #{endTime},
where ID = #{id}
and VERSION = #{selfVersion}
